title: 1 dead, 3 injured after shooting in Allapattah
content:
Four men were shot Thursday night in Allapattah, according to Miami Police.
Miami Herald news partner CBS4 reported that one victim had died.
Three of the men were shot in the extremities, and one was wounded in the chest, said Miami Police spokeswoman Frederica Burden.
Three of the victims were taken to the hospital by friends or family. One was found at Gwen Cherry Projects, located at 2108 Northwest 19th Terrace. The call came in just before 9 p.m. The youngest victim is 19 and the others were in their 20s.
There are few details police know, including whether the address where the man was found is where the shooting occurred.
“It’s not clear as to what actually took place. The investigation is in its early stages,” Burden said.
